{"step_by_step_thinking": "Long term glucose control cannot be assessed by post prandial blood sugar or fasting blood sugar as these only provide a snapshot of the glucose level at a specific time. Urine sugar level is also not a reliable indicator of long term glucose control as it can be influenced by factors such as kidney function.
